thread.section_title: Michael's House - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Michael's House, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: teargas
title: Excellent
text:
I stayed there at 2 different times for 3 nights each. I found the rooms clean and tidy, the breakfast was adequate, and the staff were extremely helpful. English speaking staff made our stay brilliant.
My only issue about the place, would be finding it the first time you go there. But once you know where it is, no problem.
